author: Jean-Pierre
content: Iconic designs: What about the Wayfarer or the RS?

author: Ben Fuller
content: What is fun is that all three icons got their PR boost at the America’s Teacup Regatta, Bruce’s answer to the America’s Cup when he was editor of One Design. The Laser debued there sailed by Canadian Olympic Funn champion Hans Fogh. I think it went out as the TGIF as the prototype had been built in a week. It was a success, Kirby wrote it up and it took off. The Windsurfer and the Hobie 14 had come out a little earlier but didn’t have the PR boost. Hard to do in the days before social media.
